name: Galactic Grand Prix
description:
Team Name: Bixel

KEYWORDS USED: 

  • Race 
  • Universe 
  • Futuristic 

Lore:

Every single entity in the universe has come together, the technological innovations has reached somewhere beyond impossible. Intergalactic and interdimensional travel has become a daily routine. Everything is now contemporary and renewed. There’s only one thing that’s left from the primitive times: the passion for racing. This primitive sense was not only for humanity, but also for every other living things in existence.

At first, it was all just underground races... Now it is all around the galaxy. Galactic Grand Prix has quickly become a race that every racer would dream to win, that those on every planet would use to come superior to other planets.

So as the one whose ancestors had been there since the origins of racing, it’s your job to make your ancestors proud by dominating every single race to ever happen on Galactic Grand Prix with your team.
